mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOCO_BOARD(BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGDATE, READCOUNT, FILE_NAME, THUMBNAIL, USER_NO ,parent,depth,sequence) VALUES(#{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW(), #{boardReadcount}, #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, #{userNo},#{sequence},#{depth},#{sequence})
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', depth - 1), CAST(ou.BOARD_NO AS CHAR)) AS BOARD_NO, parent, depth, CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', depth - 1), CAST(ou.BOARD_TITLE AS CHAR)) AS BOARD_TITLE, sequence, ou.READCOUNT, DATE_FORMAT(ou.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, ou.USER_NO, ou.BOARD_CATEGORY, u.USER_NICKNAME AS writer, LEVEL FROM (SELECT mn.BOARD_TITLE , mn.BOARD_NO, depth , parent, sequence, mn.READCOUNT, DATE_FORMAT(mn.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, mn.USER_NO, mn.BOARD_CATEGORY, LEVEL FROM (SELECT hierarchy_connect_by_parent_eq_prior_no(BOARD_NO) AS BOARD_NO, @level AS LEVEL FROM (SELECT @start_with := 0, @id := @start_with, @level := 0 ) vars, KOCO_BOARD WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) m LEFT OUTER JOIN KOCO_BOARD mn ON mn.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO ) ou LEFT OUTER JOIN KOCO_USERS u ON ou.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE ou.BOARD_CATEGORY = 2
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT a2.USER_NICKNAME AS writer, DATE_FORMAT(a1.BOARD_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_REGDATE, a1.BOARD_TITLE, a1.BOARD_CONTENT, a1.FILE_NAME, a1.READCOUNT, a1.USER_NO , a1.BOARD_NO FROM KOCO_BOARD a1, KOCO_USERS a2 WHERE a1.USER_NO = a2.USER_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KOCO_BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = 2
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
